participant_1.background:
I listen to the music of my youth to feel like a kid again.
i have never been on an airplane.
My cooking skills are better than my singing skills.
I want a home that is safe and comfortable for my family.
Comic Con is not my thing.

participant_2.background:
I love spending time with my dog, he is the best friend I could ever ask for.
I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies.
i have been married eight years.
I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides.
i am content with my life.

content.text: What is your favorite childhood memory?
I have many great memories, but one that stands out is the time I spent at the lake with my family.
That sounds lovely. I enjoy spending time by the water too.
I also like to spend time with my dog, he is my best friend.
I love animals, but I have never had a dog.
You should get one! They are the best companions.
I might just do that. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever. He is the sweetest dog ever.
He sounds adorable. I've always wanted a golden retriever.
They are the best. My dog is my best friend.
I'm glad you have such a great friend in your dog.
Me too. He makes me happy every day.
